verses.verse: The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> is upon <S%H3068>me<s%>; because the Lord has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> me to preach good <S%H1319>news<s%> unto the <S%H6035>meek<s%>; he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to bind <S%H2280>up<s%> the <S%H7665>brokenhearted<s%>, to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> to the <S%H7617>captives<s%>, and the opening of the <S%H6495>prison<s%> to them that are <S%H631>bound<s%>;

To <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>; to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> all that <S%H57>mourn<s%>;

To <S%H7760>appoint<s%> unto them that <S%H57>mourn<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them <S%H6287>beauty<s%> for <S%H665>ashes<s%>, the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> for <S%H60>mourning<s%>, the <S%H4594>garment<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3544>heaviness<s%>; that they might be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H352>trees<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, the <S%H4302>planting<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that he might be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

And they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H2723>wastes<s%>, they shall raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H8074>desolations<s%>, and they shall <S%H2318>repair<s%> the <S%H2721>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, the <S%H8074>desolations<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>alien<s%> shall be your <S%H406>plowmen<s%> and your <S%H3755>vinedressers<s%>.

But you shall be <S%H7121>named<s%> the <S%H3548>Priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: men shall <S%H559>call<s%> you the <S%H8334>Ministers<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>: you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, and in their <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall you boast <S%H3235>yourselves<s%>.

For your <S%H1322>shame<s%> you shall have <S%H4932>double<s%>; and for <S%H3639>confusion<s%> they shall <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in their <S%H2506>portion<s%>: therefore in their <S%H776>land<s%> they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H4932>double<s%>: <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> joy shall be unto <S%H8057>them<s%>.

For I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1498>robbery<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>direct<s%> their <S%H6468>work<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%>, and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> covenant with <S%H1285>them<s%>.

And their <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: all that <S%H7200>see<s%> them shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> <S%H2233>them<s%>, that they are the seed which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

I will <S%H7797>greatly<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in my <S%H430>God<s%>; for he has <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with the <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, he has <S%H3271>covered<s%> me with the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H3547>decks<s%> himself with <S%H6287>ornaments<s%>, and as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> <S%H5710>adorns<s%> herself with her <S%H3627>jewels<s%>.

For as the <S%H776>earth<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> her <S%H6780>bud<s%>, and as the <S%H1593>garden<s%> causes the things that are <S%H2221>sown<s%> in it to spring <S%H6779>forth<s%>; so the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> will cause <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> to spring <S%H6779>forth<s%> before all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
